QuestData.Title: Camp Antonidas
QuestData.Description:
The Kirin Tor have our main camp set up to the south of here: Camp Antonidas.
I believe Noriko and Khadgar are there now gathering adventurers to aid Kalecgos in reclaiming the Azure Oathstone.
If you wish to help in our endeavours, go there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Noriko the All-Remembering in Camp Antonidas.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Noriko the All-Remembering in Camp Antonidas
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, $n. Good to see you...
Hold on... do you feel that?
